metadata.title: CVE-2022-26184 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Poetry v1.1.9 and below was discovered to contain an untrusted search pathwhich causes the application to behave in unexpected ways when usersexecute Poetry commands in a directory containing malicious content. Thisvulnerability occurs when the application is ran on Windows OS.

criterions.comment: poetry package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
poetry-core package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
